resume-describtion: I'm a 20 years old passionate Full Stack Developer (React.Js + Next.Js + Node.Js). I've invested my youth hours in deep learning to optimize myself to add the most value to your company; Doubt that? Just continue visiting this site, ask my former employers... Or hire me and watch my career for 1 month. Leave anything you worry about to me; improving your site creatively? Leading a team? Making your work environment more friendly? What are you waiting for?
